column4: Hello. I have used this lines with console and i lose my wireless connection how can get it back?
did u ifconfig ethx down then up again ?
can u check if ur able to iwlist ethx scan ?
Thanks i fixed it with your helps.
but now i cannot see any wireless network to connect?
u sure there is a wireless network nearby and the txpoer is on now ?
seems like the hardware is not detected or recognised
i have reboot but i can not see wireless networks too
